1:-module(sybasemonitor_SUITE).
    2:
    3:%% Note: This directive should only be used in test suites.

    4:-compile(export_all).
    5:
    6:-include("ct.hrl").
    7:
    8:%%--------------------------------------------------------------------

    9:%% Test server callback functions

   10:%%--------------------------------------------------------------------

   11:
   12:%%--------------------------------------------------------------------

   13:%% Function: suite() -> DefaultData

   14:%% DefaultData: [tuple()]  

   15:%% Description: Require variables and set default values for the suite

   16:%%--------------------------------------------------------------------

   17:suite() -> [{timetrap,{minutes,10}}].
   18:
   19:%%--------------------------------------------------------------------

   20:%% Function: init_per_suite(Config) -> Config

   21:%% Config: [tuple()]

   22:%%   A list of key/value pairs, holding the test case configuration.

   23:%% Description: Initiation before the whole suite

   24:%%

   25:%% Note: This function is free to add any key/value pairs to the Config

   26:%% variable, but should NOT alter/remove any existing entries.

   27:%%--------------------------------------------------------------------

   28:init_per_suite(Config) ->
   29:    Config.
   30:
   31:%%--------------------------------------------------------------------

   32:%% Function: end_per_suite(Config) -> _

   33:%% Config: [tuple()]

   34:%%   A list of key/value pairs, holding the test case configuration.

   35:%% Description: Cleanup after the whole suite

   36:%%--------------------------------------------------------------------

   37:end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   38:    ok.
   39:%%--------------------------------------------------------------------

   40:%% Function: all() -> TestCases

   41:%% TestCases: [Case] 

   42:%% Case: atom()

   43:%%   Name of a test case.

   44:%% Description: Returns a list of all test cases in this test suite

   45:%%--------------------------------------------------------------------      

   46:all() -> 
   47:    [correct_counter, current_value,error_counter_server, 
   48:	error_counter_user, error_counter_password, error_value_server, 
   49:	error_value_user, error_value_password].
   50:
   51:	
   52:%% Function: sequences() -> Sequences 

   53:%%Sequences = [{SeqName,Testcases}]

   54:%%SeqName = atom()

   55:%%Testcases = [atom()]

   56:%% Description: Returns a list of sequenced test cases in this test suite

   57:sequences() ->
   58:	[].
   59:	
   60:correct_counter(_Config) ->
   61:	P = sybase_monitor:new(),
   62:	Params = [{server,"192.168.0.65"},{usr,"sa"},{pwd,"888888"}],
   63:	
   64:	Ret = P:getBrowseData(Params),
   65:	
   66:	{comment, Ret}.
   67:
   68:current_value(_Config) ->
   69:	P = sybase_monitor:new(),	
   70:	P:set_property(server, "192.168.0.65"),
   71:	P:set_property(usr, "sa"),
   72:	P:set_property(pwd, "888888"),
   73:	P:set_property(browse,[{"perfmon$pack_errors","pack errors"}]),
   74:	
   75:	P:update(),
   76:	
   77:	{ok, {state_string, Good}} = P:get_attribute(state_string),
   78:	
   79:	{comment, Good}.
   80:	
   81:error_counter_server(_Config) ->	
   82:	P = sybase_monitor:new(),
   83:	Params = [{server,"192.168.0.60"},{usr,"sa"},{pwd,"888888"}],
   84:	
   85:	Ret = P:getBrowseData(Params),
   86:	
   87:	{comment, Ret}.
   88:
   89:error_counter_user(_Config) ->
   90:	P = sybase_monitor:new(),
   91:	Params = [{server,"192.168.0.65"},{usr,"s"},{pwd,"888888"}],
   92:	
   93:	Ret = P:getBrowseData(Params),
   94:	
   95:	{comment, Ret}. 
   96:	
   97:error_counter_password(_Config) ->
   98:	P = sybase_monitor:new(),
   99:	Params = [{server,"192.168.0.65"},{usr,"sa"},{pwd,"88888"}],
  100:	
  101:	Ret = P:getBrowseData(Params),
  102:	
  103:	{comment, Ret}.
  104:
  105:error_value_server(_Config) ->
  106:	P = sybase_monitor:new(),	
  107:	P:set_property(server, "192.168.0.60"),
  108:	P:set_property(usr, "sa"),
  109:	P:set_property(pwd, "888888"),
  110:	P:set_property(browse,[{"perfmon$pack_errors","pack errors"}]),
  111:
  112:	P:update(),
  113:	
  114:	{ok, {state_string, Good}} = P:get_attribute(state_string),
  115:	
  116:	{comment, Good}.
  117:	
  118:error_value_user(_Config) ->
  119:	P = sybase_monitor:new(),	
  120:	P:set_property(server, "192.168.0.65"),
  121:	P:set_property(usr, "s"),
  122:	P:set_property(pwd, "888888"),
  123:	P:set_property(browse,[{"perfmon$pack_errors","pack errors"}]),
  124:
  125:	P:update(),
  126:	
  127:	{ok, {state_string, Good}} = P:get_attribute(state_string),
  128:	
  129:	{comment, Good}.
  130:	
  131:error_value_password(_Config) ->
  132:	P = sybase_monitor:new(),	
  133:	P:set_property(server, "192.168.0.65"),
  134:	P:set_property(usr, "sa"),
  135:	P:set_property(pwd, "88888"),
  136:	P:set_property(browse,[{"perfmon$pack_errors","pack errors"}]),
  137:
  138:	P:update(),
  139:	
  140:	{ok, {state_string, Good}} = P:get_attribute(state_string),
  141:	
  142:	{comment, Good}.
  143:
